Class ClassGroupDAO

java.lang.Object
dao.ClassGroupDAO
public class ClassGroupDAO extends Object
Data Access Object for ClassGroup entities. Provides CRUD operations for the class_group table in the database.

      Creates a new class in the database.

      Returns:
      The generated class ID if successful
      Throws:
      SQLException - If a database access error occurs

      Retrieves a class by its ID.
      Parameters:
      classId - The ID of the class to retrieve
      Returns:

      Parameters:

      Returns:

      Parameters:

      teacherId - The ID of the teacher
      Returns:
      true if the update was successful, false otherwise
